About Me

I am a white male in my early 40s. I have lived in Utah almost all my life. I have worked at Conduent/Xerox/ACS for the past 16 years most as an Operations Manager for an Accounts Payable department. I have always dreamed of learning to code. This has been a dream of mine since i received my first computer game or nintendo. I am having so much fun with this coding stuff its blowing my mind!

Weather-Dashboard

Built With: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, ES6, jQuery, Bootstrap

This site allows you to search any given city in the united states and get a five day forecast including wind, uv index, & humidity along with icons for the weather and a save feature to look at past searches.
